data.prayer: Lord, make the 28,449 believers in Buldana to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,557,850 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Buldana, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 28,449 believers in Buldana against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Buldana, Maharashtra, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Buldana.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kolhati people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kolhati people.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Buldana, Maharashtra, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Buldana, Maharashtra, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary:
the county of Buldana, Maharashtra, India has a population of 2,586,300.

We estimate Buldana has 28,449 people who might know Jesus, 31,380 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,526,470 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Buldana to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
